name: Elfs From Elsewhere!
description:
Absolute POWER CORRUPTS ABSOLUTELY.

These words are the curse of the enigma known as the halfbringer.

You are the halfbringer.

You have had everything you ever wanted in life and this world until one day you decide you want something that cannot be provided. In this mystery story featuring elves and demons learn how a man can fall into the hole of depravity.

Become the halfbringer



    if you like sexy elves , busty demons and also just enjoying a good story then this game is perfect for you.
  • Traditional Visual Novel.
  • Over 1000 Renders.
  • An engaging mystery.
  • An ever expanding story and IP.

Meet Interesting and Diverse Characters .

Date the Girl (or Girls) Of Your Dream.
